channel.title: Luzoxpk loading 602/667
channel.description:
Banner coming soon
Hello Users,
Every weekend we do something else this could be, Double experience weekend || Double rare drops weekend || Double slayer points || Triple pk points
[SIZE=4]Introduction[/SIZE]
We are a Economic based server we do have P'king in our features but our mainly focus is on skilling and pvming to give you the best pvm/skilling experience.
[SIZE=4]Skill-Points[/SIZE]
Gain 10 skilling points for leveling up any skill including combat, spend them in the skilling shop for awesome rewards.
[SIZE=5]Links:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/forums.png[/img]Site [url=http://luzoxpk.net]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/PlayNow.png[/img]Download Client [url=http://luzoxpk.net/luzoxpk.jar]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/PlayNow.png[/img]Webclient [url=http://luzoxpk.net/webclient]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/vote.png[/img]Vote [url=http://luzoxpk.net/vote]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/vote.png[/img]Highscores [url=http://luzoxpk.net/highscores]Click Here[/url]
Welcome and thank you for clicking on our advertisement page. We are Luzoxpk, We offer an amazing experience for RSPS players.
Luzoxpk features include: Minigames P'king Decent economy Professional Staff and Owner Always staff online or owner 100+ Achievements [Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite] Daily Updates Tree farming Loyalty points 200 per hour Luzoxpk points to receive the best items Prestige up to 3 prestiges
We hope to see you soon on Luzoxpk!

@luzoxpk wrote:

Hello Users,
